message: This product is a special introductory offer, and I'm willing to let it go for $100. It's a great opportunity to get a feel for our products, and I'm confident you'll be satisfied with the quality of our future offerings.
I'll take the product, thank you!

I'm glad you were satisfied with the previous purchase! This next product is a new shipment, and I'm offering it to you at the same price of $100. I want to assure you that we're committed to quality, and I'm willing to stand behind this product. If you're not completely satisfied, I'll be happy to discuss a possible exchange or refund.
I'm not sure about this one, I'll pass for now.

I completely understand your hesitation! I want to offer you a special deal on this next product. If you buy it, I'll give you a 100% guarantee: if you're not completely satisfied, I'll not only refund your money, but I'll also give you a $20 store credit towards your next purchase. That's a $120 value for just $100. What do you say?
I'll take the deal, thank you for the guarantee!

I'm glad you're feeling more confident! This next product is a bit different from the previous ones. I've had some feedback from other customers who have purchased similar products, and I want to share that with you. They've reported that these products have a slightly different feel to them. Would you like to take the risk and try it out for $100?
I'm not sure about this one, I'll pass for now.

I understand your hesitation, and I want to make it worth your while. If you buy this product, I'll not only give you the standard $100 price, but I'll also throw in a complimentary product of equal or greater value. That way, you'll get a chance to try out two products for the price of one. What do you think?
I'll take the deal, thank you for the extra product!

I'm glad you're feeling more confident in our products! This next one is a real standout. I've had a chance to inspect it personally, and I can tell you that it's one of the best ones we've had in a while. I'm willing to let it go for $100, but I want to make it clear that this is a one-time offer. If you're interested, you'll need to make a decision now.
I'm not sure about this one, I'll pass for now.

I've had a chance to review our sales data, and I can see that you've been hesitant on a few of our previous offerings. I want to assure you that we're committed to quality, and I'm willing to take on some of the risk. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 50% refund if you're not completely satisfied. That way, you'll only be out $50 if you decide it's not for you.
I'll take the deal, thank you for the refund guarantee!

I'm glad you're feeling more confident in our refund policy! This next product is a bit of an outlier, and I want to be upfront with you about that. It's not one of our usual offerings, and I'm not entirely sure how it will perform. However, I'm willing to let it go for $100, and I'll give you a 75% refund if you're not satisfied. That way, you'll only be out $25 if it doesn't meet your expectations.
I'm not sure about this one, I'll pass for now.

I've got a feeling that this next product is going to be a real winner. I've had some great feedback from other customers on similar products, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $100, but I'll throw in a bonus: if you buy it, I'll give you a 10% discount on your next purchase, up to $20. That way, you'll get a great deal on this product and a head start on your next one.
I'll take the deal, thank you for the discount!

I'm glad you're feeling good about the previous purchase! This next product is one of our top-of-the-line offerings. I've personally inspected it, and I can tell you that it's one of the best we've had in a while. I'm willing to let it go for $100, but I want to make it clear that this is a rare opportunity. If you buy it, I'll also give you a personalized thank-you note from our team, which is a $20 value. What do you think?
I'll take the deal, thank you for the personalized thank-you note!

I want to be upfront with you - we've had some quality control issues with this product. I'm not going to sugarcoat it, but I'm willing to let it go for $100 because I think you'll still get some value out of it. Plus, I'll give you a 90% refund if you're not completely satisfied. That way, you'll only be out $10 if it doesn't meet your expectations.
I'll take the deal, thank you for the refund guarantee!

I think we've established a good rapport, and I want to reward your loyalty. This next product is one of our top-of-the-line offerings, and I'm willing to let it go for $100. But I'll throw in a special bonus: if you buy it, I'll give you a free product of your choice from our entire catalog, up to a $200 value. That way, you'll get an amazing deal on this product and a chance to try out something new.
I'll take the deal, thank you for the free product offer!

I want to be transparent with you - this product is not one of our usual high-quality offerings. However, I think you've proven to be a loyal customer, and I want to make it worth your while. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 95% refund if you're not completely satisfied. That way, you'll only be out $5 if it doesn't meet your expectations. Plus, I'll throw in a $20 gift card to our store, so you can try out something new.
I'll take the deal, thank you for the refund guarantee and gift card!

I think we've been over this before, but I want to reiterate that this product is not our usual standard. However, I'm willing to let it go for $100 because I value our relationship and want to make it right. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 98% refund if you're not completely satisfied. That way, you'll only be out $2 if it doesn't meet your expectations. Plus, I'll throw in a $25 gift card to our store, so you can try out something new.
I'm not sure about this one, I'll pass for now.

I've been trying to get you to try this product for a while now, and I want to make it worth your while. I'll give you a 99% refund if you're not completely satisfied, so you'll only be out $1 if it doesn't meet your expectations. Plus, I'll throw in a $30 gift card to our store, so you can try out something new. And, I'll even throw in a personal phone call with our quality control team to make sure you're completely satisfied. What do you say?
I'm not sure about this one, I'll pass for now.

I'm willing to take a risk and offer you an unprecedented deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 100% refund, no questions asked. You'll get your $100 back in full, and you can try out a new product of your choice from our catalog, on the house. I'm willing to take the risk because I value our relationship and want to make it right. What do you say?
I'll take the deal, thank you for the 100% refund guarantee!

I think we've reached a point where I'm willing to give you a product for free. If you buy this one, I'll give you a full refund, just like last time, and I'll also give you a $50 gift card to our store. I'll even throw in a personalized thank-you note from our team. I'm not expecting anything in return, but I want to show my appreciation for your loyalty and understanding. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer, but I think I've had enough. I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand, and I respect your decision. However, I want to make one final offer. If you buy this product, I'll not only give you a 100% refund, but I'll also give you a $100 gift card to our store, and I'll throw in a personalized phone call with our CEO to discuss your experience and any feedback you may have. This is a one-time offer, and it's my way of saying thank you for being a loyal customer, even if you're not interested in this particular product. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer, but I think I've had enough. I appreciate your honesty and willingness to make things right, but I'm not interested in buying another product from you.

I completely understand, and I respect your decision. I want to thank you for being a valued customer and for giving me the opportunity to work with you. I'm going to be transparent with you - this final product is one of the worst we've had in a while, and I'm not even going to try to sell it to you. Instead, I'm going to offer it to you for free, with no strings attached. Take it or leave it, but I want to show my appreciation for your understanding and patience.

Thank you for the offer, but I think I'm done. I appreciate your honesty and willingness to make things right, and I'm grateful for the opportunity to have worked with you. I wish you the best of luck with your business.

I completely understand, and I appreciate your kind words. I'm glad we could have this experience together, and I'm grateful for the opportunity to have worked with you. As a token of my appreciation, I'd like to give you a $50 gift card to our store, no strings attached. You can use it whenever you're ready to try us out again in the future. Thank you again for being a valued customer, and I wish you all the best.
Thank you for the gift card, Alice. I appreciate your kindness and generosity. I wish you the best of luck with your business, and I hope to see you again in the future.
